title: Item within a population
description: Items are a central concept in the data specification. An item belongs to a population, and can be either the state of this population as measured at a given time point, or an individual within this population.

level.description: Whether the item is the state of the population or an individual

population.description: Identifier of the population to which the item belongs

traits.description: Identifiers of the traits values for this item

size.description: Number of individuals (if level is population)

units.description: Units in which the population size was measured
